nodes.bodyText: I added this since we are running tests by setting hub-central-developer role to hc-test-user.

added this method to verify Map, Custom tabs in Curate tile that is exposed on roles. IDE will give a better picture of the params. Added docs to help understand the params, just mouse over the method name for more details in your IDE.

@wooldridge @briantang we need to add these to all the modal in future PRs so they dont lie around hidden in the DOM. It affects the tests since labels like Yes/No or Cancel/Save is common between them.
@bsrikan Makes sense. Should I create a task for adding this property in to all Modals across the app?
